data.html: The touch response on the Kindle Paperwhite is just good enough that I want Amazon to open up their e-ink readers as a platform. I’d love to see a fully-functional read later service on it that lets me fave and archive in a non-klugy way.
data.text: The touch response on the Kindle Paperwhite is just good enough that I want Amazon to open up their e-ink readers as a platform. I’d love to see a fully-functional read later service on it that lets me fave and archive in a non-klugy way.

data.text: 【2012年11月6日 17:00 富山県 気象情報】富山県では、７日にかけて大気の状態が不安定となり、局地的に雷雲が発達する見込みです。落雷や降ひょう、竜巻などの激しい突風、急な強い雨に注意してください。
